CustomProperties.Tooltip: Table used for building up the navigation menu. Every item needs to have a property for navigation item title and a target screen to navigate to for the menu to work.

CustomProperties.Name: ActiveIndicatorColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color of the line indicating the currently active menu item

CustomProperties.Name: ActiveFontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Font color of the currently active menu item

CustomProperties.Name: InactiveFontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Font color of menu items currently inactive

CustomProperties.Name: MenuFill
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Fill color of both the horizontal and vertical menu

CustomProperties.Name: MenuHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Use this property to set the height of the menu elements instead of the 'regular' height property to support flexible height of the menu to show or hide the vertical menu element.

CustomProperties.Name: ComponentHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Calculated height of the component based on if secondary menu is shown or hidden. Used as input for the Height property of the component.

CustomProperties.Name: IconColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Icon color of ellipses and hamburger icon in text format (css or hex) to allow use for both icons.

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Color of the line indicating the currently active menu item
RGBA(122, 184, 0, 1)

//Font color of menu items currently inactive
RGBA(153, 150, 155, 1)

//Font color of the currently active menu item
White

//Fill color of both the horizontal and vertical menu
RGBA(74, 74, 74, 1)

//Use this property to set the height of the menu items instead of the 'regular' height property to support flexible height of the menu to show or hide the vertical menu element. 
100

//Icon color of ellipses and hamburger icon in text format (css or hex) to allow use for both icons.
"White"

//Use the MenuHeight-property to set the height of the menu instead of this property to support flexible height of the menu to show or hide the vertical menu element.
Self.ComponentHeight

//Background color of the whole menu. Input property 'Menu Fill' is used for the actual color of the horizontal and/or vertical menu. 
Transparent

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
//Use this property to set the height of the menu instead of the 'regular' height property to support flexible height of the menu to show or hide the vertical menu element. 
100
If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Show ellipses when not all menu items can be shown in available space
CountRows(galHorizontalMenu.AllItems) < CountRows(Parent.MenuItems) && CountRows(galHorizontalMenu.AllItems) > 0

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))
